zimmerman.jacob.notebook

Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • zimmerman.jacob.notebook.Notebook

  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a frame that has a text field and a menu. Provides methods for opening, saving, and editing text files. Has many functions in common with Microsoft(r) Notepad.

    • Field Summary
